features: 【Scientific structure】Our gaming table uses a scientific Z-shape, the force is uniform and stable without shaking, the desktop is L-shaped, the desktop is sufficient, and the scientific structural design allows him to have more stable functions.The gaming desk can effectively use the corner space while providing more storage space.

【High quality materials】This desktop uses P2 grade particleboard, which is 100% non-toxic, and better care for the health of your family. The desktop of the computer desk uses 15mm thick particleboard material, which is more firm and durable, and table can also accompany you for a long time .

【Optional tray table installation location】n order to alleviate your work fatigue, this electronic sports table especially adds a small table board, so that you can put your display on it, to prevent cervical fatigue caused by frequent bowing, but also better protect your vision.

【Stylish design】 This table uses variety of colors are available，Elegant white, classic brown, noble black, lovely pink, beautiful design and novel, whether placed in the bedroom or living room, can play a very good decorative role, enrich your home decoration.

【Adjustable table feet】 This nightstand is equipped with adjustable table corners, which can meet different needs in different environments to adjust the table feet, so that the product is more stable and more adaptable to different environments.
body.description: Features: Stylish design:This table uses variety of colors are available，Elegant white, classic brown, noble black, lovely pink, beautiful design and novel, whether placed in the bedroom or living room, can play a very good decorative role, enrich your home decoration. High quality : This gaming desk adopts 15mm P2 particleboard, 100% safe and drug-free, strong and durable, which can better protect the health of you and your family Super Surface: This game table is made specifically for game victory, consisting of a 50.4 inch (L) and a 32.3 inch (L) large game table, you can place your favorite large screen display, cool mechanical keyboard, and plenty of room for other gaming equipment and drinks and snacks, so that you can release your excitement in time after the victory. Easy to assemble: This gaming desk is easy to assemble, comes complete with instructions and complete tools, and in a short amount of time, you will be able to build your own gaming space by hand. Optional tray table installation location：In order to alleviate your work fatigue, this electronic sports table especially adds a small table board, so that you can put your display on it, to prevent cervical fatigue caused by frequent bowing, but also better protect your vision. . Easy to clean: This computer desk t is not only resistant to dirt, but also easy to clean up by gently wiping it with water, saving you time to clean up, This gaming table also comes with a basic waterproof function, and you don't have to worry about spilling water on it .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Arrived early. Impressed on the simplicity and ease of assembly. Directions were easy to follow, screw/bolts placed in separate bags and lettered, tool included .The desk looks really good. Super satisfied, especially for the price. For anyone on a budget but still seeking high quality …I definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This desk was so easy to put up, I had it done in like 10 minutes. The directions are straight forward, and it is really sturdy. It came really fast too, almost as fast as it was for me to assemble the desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was a great desk for the price and was easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars For the Price it was Worth and Easy to Setup 30min I took my time lol
reviews.reviewText: I needed an L-Shape for my new stay at home Job and it is soooo useful I have my gaming set up on one side and work on the other side it fits 3 monitors a small box PC 2 keyboards 2 long mouse pads a fan my controller holde for games my 1TB drive my usb port all my cars below my monitor with that stand my mic like it has so much space then my pc underneath it is a beautiful desk and very sturdy and easy to set up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a Boy Wants
reviews.reviewText: My son is 15 he loves his desk it is sturdy and strong has some style to it wrapped around in a L shape a little color very nice makes his room look adorable got to give it a 👍👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent value for the price
reviews.reviewText: Be very careful to use the proper size screws or you may go right through the table top without even knowing it. You’ll turn it over and….surprise oops! What a bummer. Total user error. However it’s not the sturdiest deal and how the units join in the center is not great. But for the price $45 you can’t beat it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For one it’s pretty small and feels kinda cheap. Not bad for the price tho, the shipping was absolutely terrible I ordered over 3 weeks ago and finally got it.. kinda insane especially if I’m paying 30 dollars for shipping…
